articles.title: Garcetti announces Los Angeles can reopen for in-person shopping starting Wednesday with safety protocols - FOX 11 Los Angeles
articles.description: Los Angeles Mayor Eric Garcetti announced Tuesday that all retail businesses may reopen for in-person shopping starting Wednesday and that houses of worship can resume, as long as they adopt the county's COVID-19 safety protocols.
